document_data.name: Masked Marauders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Masked Marauders''' were an evil adventuring company in [[Myth Drannor]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.History: The Masked Marauders operated in [[Thay]] but in 1370 DR they quickly escaped from that country. After a journey through [[Impiltur]] and [[Calaunt]], they diverted a ship to Myth Drannor, where they hoped to gain many treasures from the ruins or from other adventurers.
